FuncDef:
The service-group command creates a service group.
The undo service-group command deletes an existing service group.
By default, no service group is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service group.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, in bytes.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You cannot delete a service group that is not created.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
